comments:
Renaming a JPA Project results in a null pointer exception.  Validating the renamed project results in an NPE and never completes.


java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jpa.core.internal.validation.JpaValidator.validateInJob(JpaValidator.java:39)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.ValidatorJob.run(ValidatorJob.java:65)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Created an attachment (id=67850)
proposed patch

Fix the resource change processor to respond to projects being added correctly, but not to respond twice (in case of project creation)
